resources.string: Hi Welcome! Thanks for downloading my application. Let\'s cut the chase and play some games! However, I\'ll have to create a Reddcoin wallet for you. Once you have a stable internet connection, click the button below!

array.name: help
array.item: 1) A wallet is unique for every phone. If you\'re changing to a new smartphone, be sure to withdraw the coins to another wallet, or contact me for a direct transfer (no fees, don\'t worry).

2) Each minefield is generated the moment you click \"Play\". What I do is to fill up an array with numbers of \"1\" and \"0\", then scramble them up. No mine is planted below your finger\'s touches, Everything is random.
3) To cash out and not risk any more coins, click the multiplier above the blue \"Play\" button after the game has started.
4) To get the QR code or direct address of your wallet to share etc, click on the wallet address.
5) If the coins remaining is stuck at \"Refreshing\", click the text to initiate loading. DO NOT spam or else problems will arise.

6) A SHA256 hash of the mines\' positions and current game\'s data is generated. After the game ends, the actual value is shown. Click on it and it will open up a webpage for you to verify the actual game hash.
7) Any game or data/transaction manipulation will result in an instant ban.
